definition: a pier/a landing-stage/a loading trestle for goods or passengers/a platform
a wooden or bamboo pen for sheep or cattle/wood or bamboo trestlework/a warehouse

sentences.english: In this paper, the technical features of the structure of the Bridge are briefly described.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹粵海鐵路棧橋的結構技術特點。

sentences.english: Trestle circling around the lake, backlighting, Nanking, winter 2007
sentences.chinese: 環湖棧橋，逆光，南京，2007冬季。

sentences.english: Walking the 440-meter-long bridge is a great way to enjoy breezes coming off the sea.
sentences.chinese: 徐徐走過440米的棧橋，享受海面吹來的陣陣微風。

sentences.english: Pier plans Bo cut the waves, lying in the blue sea like a long queue silver wave.
sentences.chinese: 棧橋劃波斬浪，象一條長龍橫臥於碧海銀波。

sentences.english: The first piece is about the tractive calculation on railway trestle .
sentences.chinese: 論文的第一篇是關於鐵路棧橋列車牽引計算。

sentences.english: Railway trestle and railway are arranged in the southwest of the plant area according to planning requirement.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路棧橋與鐵路根據規劃要求佈置在廠區西南側。

sentences.english: In this paper, the key points of design and construction of the suspension trestle are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹懸索棧橋的設計及施工要點。

sentences.english: At one end is Huilange Pagoda, a classic beauty that hosts historic and cultural exhibits throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 棧橋的一頭是回瀾閣，它一年四季展示着古典的展品。

definition: Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: to go sightseeing/to spend one's leisure time wandering around
Tungyin Island, one of the Matsu Islands/Tungyin township in Lienchiang county 連江縣|连江县[Lian2 jiang1 xian4], Taiwan
Shuangxi or Shuanghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
